gov.lbl.glamm.server.dao
Interface ExperimentDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExperimentDAOImpl, ExperimentMicroarrayDAOImpl, ExperimentSessionDAOImpl
public interface ExperimentDAO

Data access object interface for experiments.

Author:
jtbates

getAllExperimentsForTaxonomyId

java.util.List<Experiment> getAllExperimentsForTaxonomyId(java.lang.String taxonomyId)
Gets the list of all experiments for a given taxonomy id. The list's content depends on the access level of the user.

Parameters:
taxonomyId - The taxonomy id.
Returns:
The list of experiments.
